entities.name: vare
entities.description: Vare is mentioned as the one who Herm-own-nin ny is asking about. The text says 'said a voice' but then refers to Vare by name.

entities.name: herm-own-nin ny
entities.description: Herm-own-nin ny is the person being asked about in the conversation. The text does not provide any further information about her.

entities.name: krum
entities.description: Krum is a person who has arrived at the table and is looking for Herm-own-nin ny. He is described as 'looking surly'.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is a person who is having a conversation with Krum about Herm-own-nin ny. The text says he has 'made friends with Viktor Krum'.

entities.name: viktor krum
entities.description: Viktor Krum is mentioned as someone Ron has made friends with.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a person who bustles over to the table and starts talking to Ron about Viktor Krum.

relationships.description: The text says 'Made friends with Viktor Krum, have you, Ron?' which indicates that Ron and Viktor Krum are friends.
Krum is looking for Herm-own-nin ny as indicated by the text 'Veil, if you see her, tell her I haff drinks'.
Ron is also searching for Herm-own-nin ny as indicated by the text 'No idea,' said Ron mulishly, look ing up at him. 'Lost her, have you?'
Krum and Ron seem to be acquaintances as indicated by the text 'Made friends with Viktor Krum, have you, Ron?'
